name: The Naughty Kids
description:
The kids on the naughty list found out, and they're not happy!

The naughty kids have raided Santa's workshop, and are attacking the elves with snowballs!

Appease these nightmare children with presents before they can pelt you to death with snowballs.

Eat magical candy canes to gain a SURPRISING ability that may help or hinder you.

Survive 4 waves of nasty children, and meet 'The big kid", a greedy lad, who needs a lot more presents.

Alex Saunders - Programming

Chintu224 - Art

Check out Chintu224: https://chintu224.itch.io/

Music from - https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Hally/The_8bits_of_Christmas/8bp038-08-hally-...

This game was made in 48 hours for the Yogscast Game Jam 2020

Made with Construct 3 Game Engine

If the wave is not ending and you don't see any kids, go looking for them, they often get stuck.
